enrichment.title: Bulk Product Enrichment
enrichment.description: Upload your e-shop product export and let AI automatically extract and fill in product parameters.

upload.title: Upload File
upload.platformDescription: Select the e-commerce platform your export file is from.
upload.invalidFileType: Please upload a CSV or Excel file (.csv, .xlsx, .xls)
upload.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than {maxSize}MB
upload.exportInstructionsDescription: For the tool to work correctly, you need to export a file with specific columns.
upload.allowedColumnsDescription: You can include these columns in your export. Any other columns will cause an error.
upload.specialColumnsNote: Additionally, columns starting with filteringProperty: and textProperty are allowed.
upload.step4: In export settings, check only the allowed columns (see list above)
upload.step5: Download the export and upload it here

configuration.title: Enrichment Configuration
configuration.extractionModeDescription: Select what type of data you want to extract from product descriptions.
configuration.sourceColumnsDescription: Select which columns AI should analyze to extract parameters. More sources = better results.
configuration.generateFilteringDescription: Extract attributes for product filters (e.g. Color, Size, Material). Creates columns like
configuration.generateTextPropertiesDescription: Extract informational properties (e.g. Warranty, Care). Uses format
configuration.extractionInstructionsDescription: Tell AI exactly what attributes to extract from products.
configuration.filteringInstructionsPlaceholder:
Examples:
- Color (e.g. Red, Blue, Green)
- Material (e.g. Cotton, Polyester, Leather)
- Size (e.g. S, M, L, XL)
- Brand
configuration.filteringInstructionsDescription: List the filtering attributes you want to extract. Be specific about expected values.
configuration.textInstructionsPlaceholder:
Examples:
- Warranty
- Product Care
- Dimensions
- Weight
- Country of Origin
configuration.textInstructionsDescription: List the informational properties you want to extract. They will be formatted as Key;Value.
configuration.limitsDescription: Set the maximum number of parameters to extract.
configuration.clearExistingDescription: Remove all existing filteringProperty and textProperty columns and replace them with newly generated values.

processing.title: Processing
processing.description: Process all {count} rows using AI extraction.
processing.processingNote: Processing may take several minutes depending on the number of rows.
processing.keepWindowOpen: Please keep this window open during processing. For large files, processing may take several minutes.
processing.errorsIncluded: These products were included in the output but don't have extracted parameters.

validation.emptyFields: shortDescription, description, name fields are empty

settings.title: Settings
settings.comingSoon: Settings and preferences will be available here in future updates.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.description: Manage your account settings and preferences
profile.name: Name

dashboardPage.title: Dashboard
dashboardPage.quickActionsHint: Navigate using the sidebar to access different features.
